openstack_compute_secgroup_v2.description: Manages a V2 security group resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client.

name.description: A unique name for the security group. Changing this

description.description: A description for the security group. Changing this

rule.description: A rule describing how the security group operates. The

from_port.description: An integer representing the lower bound of the port

to_port.description: An integer representing the upper bound of the port

ip_protocol.description: The protocol type that will be allowed. Changing

cidr.description: Required if `from_group_id` or `self` is empty. The IP range

from_group_id.description: Required if `cidr` or `self` is empty. The ID of a
